product_name: Club Ride Tweet Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Hop off your bike and blend in with the rest of civilization. The sleeveless Club Ride Tweet Bike Jersey doesn't look like a bike jersey but has all the benefits of one. Lightweight and stretchy polyester blend fabric breathes and dries quickly, things you'll appreciate when you're tooling around town on 2 wheels. Fabric provides UPF 20 protection from harmful solar rays. 2 rear teardrop pockets are handy spots to put your essentials on your ride.
short_description: Hop off your bike and blend in with the rest of civilization. The sleeveless Club Ride Tweet Bike Jersey doesn't look like a bike jersey but has all the benefits of one.
